bibl.seg: CAPASSO Mario and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005. (Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005.)
